## R Markdown



```{r wine1}

fit <- lm(price ~ num_rooms ,data = house_data)

summary(fit)

plot(house_data$num_rooms,house_data$price)
abline(fit)


```



```{r wine2}
library(splines)
lm.regressionSplines <- lm(price ~ bs(num_rooms, df = 3), data = house_data)
summary(lm.regressionSplines)
plot(lm.regressionSplines)
```



```{r wine3}
library(mgcv)
gam.1 <- gam(price ~ bs(num_rooms, df = 3), data = house_data)
summary(gam.1)

plot(gam.1, residuals = TRUE, cex = 2)
```


## Tree's


